description: This file initializes and renders the root React component in a React.js frontend application. It imports React, ReactDOM, global CSS styles, and the main App component, then creates a root element and renders the application within React.StrictMode for development checks.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to enable concurrent rendering of React components.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root created.
